description:
Gizmo`s Kecleon was sent into Cerise Laboratory by going invisible at night with a camera so Gizmo Bilt could see the passwords for the data that had been collected and stored on the labs computers and delete it.
It was discovered by Goh`s Drizzile and the two battled throughout the lab and then onto the roof where Goh`s Drizzile evolved into an Inteleon and was able to capture Gizmo Bilt and Gizmo`s Kecleon.
name: Kakureon (Yabashi Yaba)
